other_title: クラナド アフターストーリー (Japanese)
plot: Life continues on for Tomoya. A few months have passed since he confessed his love to Nagisa. Now entering the second semester, he continues to meet a variety of different people, expanding his own world in the process. As well, Tomoya and Nagisa's relationship begins to enter a level of intimacy unlike before. Through his relationship with Nagisa, and his various encounters, Tomoya begins to understand the meaning and importance of family. Unfortunately, as Tomoya and Nagisa begin their own family together, they are faced with many hardships and challenges along the way.
opening_theme: "Toki o Kizamu Uta" (時を刻む唄, "A Song to Pass the Time") by Lia
insert_song: "Chiisana Tenohira (小さなてのひら)" by Riya (ep 22)
"Dango Daikazoku (だんご大家族)" by Chata, Akane Fujieda, Kitsune Kunai, Marie, Morrigan, Rio, Takumaru (ep 20)
"Dango Daikazoku ~Instrumental~ (だんご大家族)" by Jun Maeda (eps 15,22)
"Sakura Jokyoku (桜抒曲 (さくらじょきょく))" by Riya (ep 25)
"Shōjo no Gensō (少女の幻想)" by Riya (ep 22)
